ygData.subject: Re: Staff of Writhing
ygData.msgSnippet: ... They Do look awesome..I wear a combination of Charred and bronze plate and get told all the time how impressive it looks..I also wield a silvery 1h axe in
ygData.messageBody:
>>From: Carole Roth <galaxy4@...>
>>
>>I have decided to make it my goal to attain a staff of writhing
>>Problem is I dont know where i can find one or about how much they sell
>>for. >>
>>Flatliner Shadowsong, Tunare
>>


They Do look awesome..I wear a combination of Charred and bronze plate and
get told all the time how impressive it looks..I also wield a silvery 1h axe
in my other hand (half elf female bard). The staff usually fires 2-3 times
per round for me..add it up...hmm 18 for bellow 48 for staff reg damage on
axe averages 18..another 20 or so for the blunt damage from the staff..not
bad for a bard AT ALL. On my server they can go for as much as 1000plat..or
as little as a friends good wishes. A wizard friend of mine made a
creative deal for his..he agreed to port the person who gave him his
anywhere for the entirety of a level whenever she asked! If your level 32
or up a trade of the mana song for a level or two might help......


Elyana Silvanae
Bardess of the 35th Chorus
Ambassador to the Ridgerunners
Innoruuk Server
